price: Dan berilah mereka peringatan tentang hari penyesalan, (yaitu) ketika segala perkara telah diputus.  Dan mereka dalam kelalaian dan mereka tidak (pula) beriman.
arabic: وَأَنذِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-andhir'hum yawma al-ḥasrati idh quḍiya al-amru wahum fī ghaflatin wahum lā yu'minūna
